message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $140.
I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $137.50.
Thank you for your offer. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.
I'm getting close to the point where I think I should consider selling to John, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can do $138.
